ActivityMetadata.Name: TY Synchronize Active Directory Groups and Users
ActivityMetadata.Label: TY Synchronize Active Directory Groups and Users
ActivityMetadata.Description: Synchronize Members from Active Directory Groups that have Sync enabled
ActivityMetadata.HelpHtml:
# Thycotic

Synchronize Active Directory Groups and Users

Synchronize Members from Active Directory Groups that have Sync enabled

Method: Post

OperationID: ActiveDirectoryService_Synchronize

EndPoint:

/active-directory/synchronize
